messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] To Kill a Mockingbird
messages.msgSnippet: No, I ve never been to the message boards. Or, wait, maybe I went once, just browsing around, when I first discovered the site. But thanks, I ll have to go
messages.messageBody:
No, I've never been to the message boards. Or, wait,
maybe I went once, just browsing around, when I first
discovered the site. But thanks, I'll have to go take
a look. And thanks for the info on the Mockingbird
post. I want to put it in my online homeschooling
diary, but I didn't want to take the trouble to type
it myself. ;) Juli

--- parrishml@... wrote:
> Hi Juli --
>

> "Power Puff Girls":)
>
> Re: [unschoolkingdom] the *beauty* of unschooling @
> it's best!!
> Date: 4/20/2001 6:32:36 AM Eastern Daylight Time
> From: PARRISHML
>
> OT -- Have you visited the message boards (not the
> list) at unschooling.com?
>
> I still go over there and read-but-not-post, and
> sometimes I actually think,
> "Wonder if Juli has seen this?" I mean, I know that
> Tracy, Kerry, Mercy,
> Sarieah (Amy, Cath, Jen?) did their time there. It
> can be a kinda scary place
> (nobody waiting to ambush you here in the kingdom),
> but it's worth visiting
> if only to read everything Joyce (Jfetterol) has
> ever posted.
>
> Sorry if you are, like, "Oh, duh, of course I've
> been there, Laura." :)
>
> Laura
>
> Laura

You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him to find it within himself --Galileo

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] To Kill a Mockingbird
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Juli -- It was me. It was me. (Quoting MoJo JoJo from Power Puff Girls :) Re: [unschoolkingdom] the *beauty* of unschooling @ it s best!! Date:
messages.messageBody:
Hi Juli --

"It was me. It was me." (Quoting MoJo JoJo from "Power Puff Girls":)

Re: [unschoolkingdom] the *beauty* of unschooling @ it's best!!
Date: 4/20/2001 6:32:36 AM Eastern Daylight Time
From: PARRISHML

OT -- Have you visited the message boards (not the list) at unschooling.com?

I still go over there and read-but-not-post, and sometimes I actually think,
"Wonder if Juli has seen this?" I mean, I know that Tracy, Kerry, Mercy,
Sarieah (Amy, Cath, Jen?) did their time there. It can be a kinda scary place
(nobody waiting to ambush you here in the kingdom), but it's worth visiting
if only to read everything Joyce (Jfetterol) has ever posted.

Sorry if you are, like, "Oh, duh, of course I've been there, Laura." :)

Laura

Laura

messages.subject: To Kill a Mockingbird
messages.msgSnippet: A while back, this month, I think, someone posted an excerpt from To Kill a Mockingbird. Would anyone remember what the date or Subject line of the post was so
messages.messageBody:
A while back, this month, I think, someone posted an excerpt from To
Kill a Mockingbird. Would anyone remember what the date or Subject
line of the post was so I can look for it? Thanks. Juli
